ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Vendui Norrathians!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... main, ... you ... Cool! ... I ... he ... gear ... Savawulf ... being ... made ... server. ... Arimasen ... 18 ... man ... currently ... The name Wulfric is
ygData.messageBody:
> Greetings! I am new to this mailing list so I thought I would give a word
> or many of introduction. At this point I would introduce myself as my
main,
> but since I'm still undecided as to who my main actually is, I will tell
you
> about my characters and how this all began.
>
Cool!
>
> I started playing EverQuest a little over a year ago. The first character
I
> ever created was a half elf rogue by the name of Wulfric Rennison who is
> currently level 31. Since Wulfric I have created a druid who originally
> started out as a half elf until I realized druids are wisdom based casters
> and half elves don't have much wisdom. So I deleted the druid at level 15
> and recreated him as a wood elf. His name is Raido Covenfall. Currently
he
> is level 40. Wulfric and Raido are really my two mains, though Wulfric
> doesn't get played much. I mainly use Raido to earn plat to buy better
gear
> for Wulfric. Then my two lesser characters are Celric Feldrak (an anagram
> for "dark elf cleric" in case you didn't catch it) a level 20 currently
> working on faction in Qeynos for the Testament of Vanear quest, and
Savawulf
> Tageric (a combination of two words - Savatage and Wulfric. Savatage
being
> my favorite band and Wulfric you already know. Wulfric incidentally is
made
> of two words "wolf" and "reich".). Those are all on the Cazic Thule
server.
> If you see one of them sometime, feel free to send a tell. Then I have
> various characters on other servers, the primary ones being Kenjite
Arimasen
> (in Japanese means "There are no forbidden subjects"), currently a level
18
> wood elf druid, and Petrus Steelsinger (so named for Peter Steele, front
man
> for the band Type O Negative), who, of course, is a bard half elf,
currently
> level 11 and rarely played.
>
The name Wulfric is very familiar. What server do you play on?
>
> And for what it's worth... I don't really have a life outside of EQ. :b
>
Neither do I!
luv,
-Su
